item.title: End BC-31A at BC-6
item.description: End BC-31A at BC-6 in New Denver. Use BC-6 north for Nakusp and Vernon; BC-6 south for Nelson.

item.title: BC-31A East - Distance Marker

item.title: BC-6 North at BC-31A - New Denver
